pullrequest.title: Add support for finding TBB via CMake config files

content.raw: Without this patch, on Windows the Debug build of Gazebo was linking the Release version of tbb, resulting in a linking error.
content.html: Without this patch, on Windows the Debug build of Gazebo was linking the Release version of tbb, resulting in a linking error.

pullrequest.title: Add support for finding TBB via CMake config files

content.raw: If I can provide any help in getting this merged \(for example reviewing other Gazebo PRs in queue\) feel free to let me know, thanks!
content.html: If I can provide any help in getting this merged (for example reviewing other Gazebo PRs in queue) feel free to let me know, thanks!

pullrequest.title: Add support for finding TBB via CMake config files
